title: League freezes
body:
Well I jumped into a league with my good friends. After that, we get into Q and when we press accept our league freezes and my friend gets a 15 minute command. We tried multiple times and we keep getting frozen please fix TY.{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} 

Thanks in advance :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

We're currently investigating this issue over in this thread
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xMFyePnf-client-feels-slow-after-club-update?comment=0006

Could you please make a post there answering the questions asked.
